title: Lamb and lentil curry
description: This rich and satisfying lamb and lentil curry uses a great-value cut of meat for a tasty dinner on a budget. This dish is great for making ahead, check the tips section for freezing instructions. This meal provides 490 kcal, 36g protein, 28g carbohydrate (of which 7g sugars), 26g fat (of which 9g saturates), 5g fibre and 2.3g salt per portion.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz lamb neck fillets, trimmed, cut into 3cm/1¼in chunks
150g/5½oz dried split red lentils, rinsed and drained
1 tsp salt, plus extra to season
75g/2½oz curly kale (or mature spinach leaves), rinsed, shredded, any tough stalks discarded
steamed rice or naan bread, to serve
